export.title: Export Data
export.description: Download data as Excel or CSV file

error.title: Export Failed
error.tooManyRecords: Too many records to export. Maximum {{max}} allowed.
error.unauthorized: You don't have permission to export this data
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred during export

import.title: Import Data
import.description: Upload Excel or CSV file to import data

dropzone.title: Drop file here or click to browse
dropzone.subtitle: Supports CSV and Excel (XLSX) files

mode.title: Import Mode
mode.createDescription: Will skip rows that match existing records
mode.updateDescription: Will skip rows that don't match existing records
mode.upsertDescription: Will create new records and update existing ones

conflictResolution.title: Conflict Resolution
conflictResolution.overwriteDescription: Replace all fields with imported values
conflictResolution.mergeDescription: Only update non-empty fields from import

validation.title: Validation Results
validation.noErrors: No errors found. Ready to import.
validation.hasErrors: Please fix the errors before importing.
validation.hasWarnings: Some rows have warnings. You can proceed with import.

conflicts.title: Resolve Conflicts
conflicts.description: The following rows match existing records. Choose how to handle each conflict.

execute.title: Execute Import
execute.confirm: Are you sure you want to import {{count}} records?
execute.confirmWithConflicts: Are you sure? {{conflicts}} conflicting records will be {{action}}.

error.title: Import Failed
error.parseError: Failed to parse file. Please check the file format.
error.encodingError: File encoding error. Please use UTF-8 encoding.
error.invalidFormat: Invalid file format. Please use CSV or XLSX.
error.tooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is {{size}}MB
error.partialSuccess: Import partially completed. {{failed}} of {{total}} rows failed.
error.unauthorized: You don't have permission to import data
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred during import

template.title: Download Template
template.description: Download a template file with the correct format and column headers

instructions.title: Template Instructions
instructions.requiredFields: Required fields are marked with an asterisk (*)
instructions.dateFormat: Dates should be in format: YYYY-MM-DD
instructions.enumNote: For dropdown fields, use the exact values provided
instructions.encoding: Save the file with UTF-8 encoding to preserve Arabic text

errors.max_length_exceeded: Value exceeds maximum length of {{max}} characters
errors.pattern_mismatch: Value doesn't match the required pattern
